item.title: Please welcome Katie Keyser!
item.dc:creator: Susan Boone
item.description:
Katie’s joining the Collection Management unit as our Electronic Resources Specialist. She comes to us from UCB where she managed electronic books, databases, and journals. She will be our primary point person for analyzing and resolving access problems for electronic resources. She’s an avid quilter—her current project is a baby ...

Read morePlease welcome Katie Keyser!

item.title: Welcome Makers Lab Technician, Jenny Tai!
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
You may remember that I introduced new Makers Lab staff member Jenny Tai back in April on Off the Shelf. Well, I am excited to announce that Jenny has accepted the Makers Lab Technician position and will be working full-time in the Makers Lab starting this week. Jenny will help ...

item.title: Now Hiring: Makers Lab Technician
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
The Library is hiring for a Makers Lab Technician position. If you know of anyone with experience in educational technology with an emphasis on emerging tech, design, or crafts, please encourage them to apply. The full-time position will provide technical support for the Makers Lab, guiding UCSF community members to ...

item.title: Welcome Joanna Kang!
item.dc:creator: Ariel Deardorff
item.description:
We are very excited to introduce Joanna Kang, who is the new Coordinator for Data Science and Marketing. Joanna will be providing administrative support to the Data Science Initiative and assisting Kemi with the library’s marketing and communication efforts. A recent transplant from Los Angeles, Joanna previously worked as an ...

item.title: Welcome Marc Andres to the Tech Commons
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description:
Please welcome Marc D. Andres to our team as an Operations Engineer starting Monday, August 10, 2015. His primary work location is the Parnassus Library, M-F 9 AM – 6 PM. Marc is transferring from the UCSF IT Service Desk (ITSD) to the Library. He is responsible for maintaining all ...

item.title: Welcome Kemi Amin!
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description:
I am delighted to report that we have a new Communications Manager starting on Monday January 5. Muinat Kemi Amin is joining us after 8 years at UC Berkeley’s Botanical Garden where she served as marketing manager. Prior to working at UC Berkeley, Kemi worked at Buy Local Berkeley, a ...

item.title: Welcome Kelsi Evans to the Archives & Special Collections
item.dc:creator: Polina Ilieva
item.description:
As you all know in 2014-2015 the UCSF is celebrating its 150th anniversary. Our new Assistant Research Archivist, Kelsi Evans will help with research and organization for several onsite and online exhibits, as well as processing, cataloging, digitization, and social media projects related to the University sesquicentennial. She will respond ...

item.description:
